description: GEANT4 Virtual Machine (G4VM) for simulations of charged particle detectors (e.g., SOHO/Chandra EPHIN and Solar Orbiter HET) performed within the SPEARHEAD (SPEcification, Analysis & Re-calibration of High Energy pArticle Data) project.
title: SPEARHEAD G4VM
